attributes.action: Let a group of citizens of the UK decide if each expence claim was "within the spirit of the agreement" and if the claim is found to be outside the guide lines the MP should have to repay the money (with interest) and if the law has been broken the MP should be prosecuted
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The claims the MP's have made proves only that they are 100% out of touch with reality in britain today.

This problem needs to be solved and a system put in place to prevent ANYTHING like this happening again

The only way any trust can be put back into this political system is to involve the public in the management of the systems which were put in place by the very people who have abused them

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
